text: There is no standard treatment for recurrent adult AML. Treatment depends on the subtype of AML and may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy.     -  Targeted therapy with monoclonal antibodies.    -  Stem cell transplant.     -  Arsenic trioxide therapy.     - A clinical trial of arsenic trioxide therapy followed by stem cell transplant.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with recurrent adult acute myelo
